publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2980 Ms Margo MacDonald: World Curling Championships 2002-That the Parliament congratulates the Scottish Women's Curling Team on winning the World Curling Championships 2002 and thanks Jackie Lockhart, Sheila Swan, Katriona Fairweather, Anne Laird, Edith Louden and their coach, Isobel Hannen, for their superb ambassadorial work for their country and sport.
S1M-2980 World Curling Championships 2002 (lodged on 15 April 2002) Michael Matheson*, John Scott*
S1M-2980 World Curling Championships 2002 (lodged on 15 April 2002) Phil Gallie*, Ms Sandra White*
S1M-2980 World Curling Championships 2002 (lodged on 15 April 2002) Mr Keith Harding*, Linda Fabiani*, Cathie Craigie*, Iain Smith*, Michael Russell*, Dorothy-Grace Elder*

S1M-2980 Ms Margo MacDonald: World Curling Championships 2002-That the Parliament congratulates the Scottish Women's Curling Team on winning the World Curling Championships 2002 and thanks Jackie Lockhart, Sheila Swan, Katriona Fairweather, Anne Laird, Edith Louden and their coach, Isobel Hannen, for their superb ambassadorial work for their country and sport. Supported by: Michael Matheson, John Scott, Phil Gallie, Ms Sandra White, Mr Keith Harding, Linda Fabiani, Iain Smith, Michael Russell, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Nora Radcliffe, Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-2980 World Curling Championships 2002 (lodged on 15 April 2002) Brian Adam*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Dennis Canavan*
S1M-2980 World Curling Championships 2002 (lodged on 15 April 2002) Kay Ullrich*
S1M-2980 World Curling Championships 2002 (lodged on 15 April 2002) Fergus Ewing*, Fiona Hyslop*
S1M-2980 World Curling Championships 2002 (lodged on 15 April 2002) Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Gil Paterson*
S1M-2980 World Curling Championships 2002 (lodged on 15 April 2002) Alex Neil*
S1M-2980 World Curling Championships 2002 (lodged on 15 April 2002) Mr Michael McMahon*
S1M-2980 World Curling Championships 2002 (lodged on 15 April 2002) Donald Gorrie*
S1M-2980 World Curling Championships 2002 (lodged on 15 April 2002) Mr Jamie McGrigor*
S1M-2980 World Curling Championships 2002 (lodged on 15 April 2002) Tricia Marwick*
